speaker.whotheyare: Kevin Roose, New York Times tech columnist and author of "Futureproof," writes about the many ways humans attempt to live alongside machines.
speaker.whylisten: An award-winning technology columnist for the New York Times, Kevin Roose's column "The Shift" examines the intersection of tech, business and culture. He's a New York Times bestselling author of three books, Futureproof, Young Money and The Unlikely Disciple; the host of Rabbit Hole, a New York Times podcast about internet culture; and a regular guest on The Daily podcast, along with other leading TV and radio shows. Before joining the Times, Roose was a writer at New York magazine and a host and executive producer of Real Future, a documentary TV series about technology and innovation. He lives in the Bay Area.
